t: Recovery: Freedom From Our Addictions : Brand, Russell: Amazon.co.uk: Books
s: My qualification for writing this book is not that I am better than you, it's that I am worse. I am an addict, addicted to drugs, alcohol, sex, money, love and fame. The program in Recovery has given Russell Brand freedom from all addictions and it will do the same for you.
